name: Abrapalabra: La Magia de Aprender a Leer
storyline: In order to motivate the child, the software presents two characters that will guide him throughout his journey; they are: the Magician Nombrón and the Rabbit Cuentín, who will live adventures in various scenarios that will serve to contextualize each of the exercises and learning units. A series of attractive fantasy characters will also be present (animals, princesses, counts, pirates, ghosts and others) to motivate the child to enter each work environment and thus promote their learning and retention.
summary: The software Abrapalabra was designed for children between 6 to 11 years old to develop their skills of writing and reading. It is a complete software with 2 CDs full of interactive activities to develop these skills.
